alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 8:47AM CST until January 29 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Sumter, Pickens and Greene Counties. Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Sumter, Marengo and Greene Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Sumter, Hale, Marengo and Greene Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and flood warnings remain in effect. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Bevill Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CST Saturday the stage was 119.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 122.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 122.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
